title: List of champions that deserve to be trash tier
body:
because their kits simply contain way too mobility damage and CC to ever be fun to play against and the only way to not have them ruin the game is to nerf their numbers to oblivion, at which point they become unplayable.

1. ekko
2. cassiopeia 
4. gnar

replies.body: Try playing all of those champs and you will see they each have their short comings. It will also make you appreciate them. Or if you find one that's op, keep playing them.
You forgot tryndamere. Mobility + tons of damage + literally cant die = bullshit.

Some of those do have bad design and need some reworking, but others them seem rather random.

Since when do Vi or Gangplank or Cassiopeia have insane mobility?
You forgot {{champion:157}} and {{champion:53}}
There's not a problem with Blitz. Look where he's facing as he fires, walk to his left. GG, you dodged his Q.
What do you do when he speed boosts to you and knocks you up?

Okay, let's pretend there's nothing you can do against Blitzcrank.

Why isn't this champion pick/ban in competitive, or even mid-high MMR then?

I thought this was about "because their kits simply contain way too mobility damage and CC to ever be fun to play against", not because they're op or have high winrates. The thing with Blitz isn't that he's OP, because he isn't, and his grab isn't hard to dodge once you get the hang of it. Not to mention most people who play him can't land a grab to save their mothers.

The thing is, if he ever does grab someone who isn't a tank, they're pretty much dead because the knock-up and silence followup will keep them helpless long enough for the rest of the team to burst them. It doesn't matter if you can dodge 9 out every 10 hooks when the one you couldn't is essentially a death sentence (which is ironic considering Thresh's actual Death Sentence is a hook that's a lot healthier).

Win or lose, a game against Blitz is never enjoyable, and that's why people hate him.

You stun somebody as Elise, they're probably dead. 

You charm somebody as Ahri, they're probably dead. 

You bind someone as Lux, they're probably dead.

You land Q as Naut, they're probably dead.

You hook someone as Thresh, they're probably dead. 

You stun someone as Veigar, they're probably dead. 

You knock up someone as Vel'Koz, they're probably dead. 

You combo someone as Alistar, they're probably dead. 

_______________

Hopefully this has enlightened you as to why Blitz is not an issue. He's not more or less fun than any of these champions.
